name.baseName: 轮胎生产;橡胶轮胎;硫化和测试;混合化合物

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the production stage is quite complex andincludes the processes of compound blending, rolling, extrusion, packet ring production, cutting and forming, vulcanizing, and testing. We combined closely related processes toavoid allocation. The following four main production processes were identified: compound blending, rolling and extrusion,cutting and forming, and vulcanizing and testin
生产阶段相当复杂，包括复合共混、轧制、挤出、包环生产、切割成型、硫化和测试等工艺。我们将密切相关的流程与避免分配。确定了以下四种主要生产工艺：复合共混、轧制和挤出，切割成型，硫化成型。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: “Data collected onsite in 2014 by one of the largest Chinese tire companies were used in the assessment. ”The article has stated that the data is related to 2014, but there is no specific time, so the time is set on January 1, 2014.
”评估中使用了中国最大的轮胎公司之一在2014年现场收集的数据“。文章中已说明数据调研与2014年，但没有具体时间，所以该时间定位2014年1月1日。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The tire production process consisting of compound blending, rolling, extrusion, packet ring production, cutting and forming, vulcanizing, and testing is used for the manufacture of rubber tires. The tires produced through this process are applicable in automotive industries for various types of vehicles, including passenger, commercial, and heavy-duty trucks. The closely related processes are combined to simplify the life cycle assessment and avoid allocation issues.
包含混合化合物、轧制、挤出、包环生产、切割成型、硫化和测试的轮胎生产过程用于制造橡胶轮胎。通过该过程生产的轮胎适用于汽车行业的各种类型车辆，包括乘用车、商用车和重型卡车。为简化生命周期评估并避免分配问题，将密切相关的过程结合在一起。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data on the raw materials used in the investigated tire product were sourced from on-site investigations of one of the largest Chinese tire companies. The data were collected in 2014 during the manufacture of the target tire product.Other materials, such as active clay, zinc oxide, stearic acid, processing agent, and lubricating oil, were also considered.Life cycle background data on these other materials were obtained from the global average LCI data of Ecoinvent 3.0
调查轮胎产品中使用的原材料数据来源于中国最大轮胎公司之一的现场调查。这些数据是在2014年目标轮胎产品制造期间收集的。还考虑了其他材料，如活性粘土、氧化锌、硬脂酸、加工剂和润滑油。这些其他材料的生命周期背景数据来自Ecoinvent 3.0的全球平均LCI数据

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.
Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The provided life cycle assessment (LCA) data from one of the largest Chinese tire companies should be utilized with the understanding that it was collected onsite in January 2014. When applying this information, users should consider that technological changes might have occurred since then, and potential updates to the data should be investigated to ensure the accuracy of the LCA. Furthermore, when modeling the use phase behavior of the tires, attention should be given to wear-and-tear processes, expected lifespan, and recycling possibilities at the end of life. The background data for additional materials obtained from Ecoinvent 3.0 should be used with the global average Life Cycle Inventory (LCI) data taken into account.
提供的来自中国最大轮胎公司之一的生命周期评估（LCA）数据应理解为是于2014年1月现场收集的。当使用这些信息时，用户应考虑到此后可能发生的技术变化，应调查数据的潜在更新以确保LCA的准确性。此外，在模式化轮胎使用阶段的行为时，应关注磨损过程、预期寿命和生命周期末期的回收可能性。从Ecoinvent 3.0获得的其他材料的背景数据应考虑使用全球平均生命周期库存（LCI）数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Waste wire cord fabric,Waste steel wire
